59  template <typename T>
60  class HyperGraphElementCreator : public AbstractHyperGraphElementCreator
61  {
62  public:
63  HyperGraphElementCreator() : _name(typeid(T).name()) {}
64 #if defined (WINDOWS) && defined(__GNUC__) // force stack alignment on Windows with GCC
65  __attribute__((force_align_arg_pointer))
66 #endif
67  HyperGraph::HyperGraphElement* construct() { return new T;}
68  virtual const std::string& name() const { return _name;}
69  protected:
70  std::string _name;
71  };
